name: DreiBlade
description:
Welcome to the world of extreme dreidel tournaments!

Take your first step into your father's legacy as you enter your first pro tournament!  Honestly, it's not as exciting as it sounds, you watch it on TV every year, though that isn't quite the same as standing in the center of the roaring crowd or looking your opponent in the eyes before knocking their dreidel out of a finely-crafted arena! 

Huh... ? What's this? That didn't sound like the announcer from last year... I wonder what's going on...

Take bets for chocolate coins! Test your meddle against a colorful cast! And most importantly, have fun! 

-

This game was submitted into the 32-bit Holiday Game Jam!
